string-array.name: podium_quote
string-array.item: \"When you truly understand karma, then you realize you are responsible for everything in your life\"
\"I believe in Karma. If the good is sown, the good is gathered. When positive things are done, it comes back good.\"
\"You have to trust something - your instincts, your destiny, your life, your karma, whatever.\"
\"Instant karma is going to get you.\"
